archimate:BusinessService.name: Disbursement
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A disbursement is processed at the conclusion of loan origination
General comment:
This service domain handles the disbursement of funds, typically for different loan facilities
Business Purpose : Handle the disbursement of funds to newly established loans/facilities as necessary
Пример использования:
Выплата обрабатывается по завершении выдачи кредита
Общее замечание:
Этот домен занимается выделением средств, как правило, для различных кредитов
деловая цель : Обрабатывать выделение средств вновь созданным кредитам / механизмам по мере необходимости
Service Domain - Disbursement This service domain handles the disbursement of funds typically for different loan facilities. Though typically a rather simple service it is modeled as a discrete service center as many banks handle disbursements from a specialist unit
Detailed Summary This service domain handles the disbursement of funds to newly established loans/facilities as necessary
Executive Summary This service domain handles the disbursement of funds to newly established loans/facilities as necessary
Examples Of Use A disbursement is processed at the closing of a new loan
